resources.string: Something went wrong while creating the bike. Please try again later.
Search for your bike by make and model. Don\'t worry if it isn\'t in the list, you will just have to enter some things manually.
Enter or modify the data of your bike.
Leave it empty if you are unsure.
Do you already have a suspension setup for your bike?
Some values seem out of the ordinary. Double check if you entered everything correctly.
Affects the stiffness when diving into the travel.
Affects how quickly the suspension decompresses
And we\'re done! You can add another bike if you want to.
